post.content:
Mainframe Programmer Job Posting


Job Title:         Mainframe Programmer
Company:         Infotech Solutions
Position Type:         Contract to Hire
Pay Rate:         40
Date Posted:         Feb-16-10
Browse Similar Postings

By employer...
- Jobs from Infotech Solutions

By location...
- Tech jobs in Toronto, ON
- Tech jobs in Ontario

By category...
- Mainframe Programmer jobs
- Mainframe jobs

ShareThis

Our client is looking for a intermediate mainframe programmer.
Responsibilities:

§ Provides maintenance and support for the student loan application

§ Translates business requirements into a technical document

§ Constructs simple to moderately complex application programs according to specifications

§ Tests application changes using internal testing standards to ensure the application meets all business and system requirements

§ Assists Quality Assurance in the user acceptance testing phase of new or modified applications to ensure system integrity

§ Implements application programs using version control tools to ensure the integrity of the application systems

§ Provides on-call support for the Mainframe applications both batch and on-line 7 x 24 as required to ensure system service level agreements are met

§ Completes documentation and knowledge transfer for completed projects



Required Competencies:

Formal computer science training (university or college diploma)
Sound practical experience using COBOL/ COBOL II in an IBM mainframe environment with MVS/ CICS/ VSAM/TSO, essential.
Effective analytical and problem solving skills, required.
Effective communication (oral and written) skills, required.
Ability to work effectively in a team under minimal supervision, within an environment of constant change and tight deadlines, required.
Sound knowledge of Windows environment preferred.
Knowledge of Easytrieve Plus, Endevor and File-AID an asset
Working knowledge of WORD, ACCESS and EXCEL, an asset
Previous experience within financial industry, an asset
Willingness to learn and be challenged required.
Send us resumes to mainframe.placements@gmail.com
Location:         Canada-ON-Toronto
Telecommute:         No (Onsite Position)
Contact Name:        James
Contact Phone:        
Contact Email:        mainframe.placements@gmail.com
Contact Comments:


Please mention Dev Bistro when contacting us.
